sameAnalysis.word_list: path, road, way, street, highway, avenue, motorway, route, lane, pavement, trail
means: path ： 多指由人或动物在田间、小丘或树丛中经常走动而踩出的小路，也指公园或花园等供人走的小径。
road ： 指连接两地间供行人或车辆使用的广阔平坦的大道，多指公路，也可用于引申意义。
way ： 普通用词，含义广泛，可指各种路、道或通道，也可指抽象的道路。
street ： 尤指城市中的道路，往往一侧或两侧有高大建筑物；还可指城市小镇、近郊可供人、车、马行走的平坦道路。
highway ： 通常指市区外可以通行各种机动车辆的交通干线。
avenue ： 在美国，指城市中一侧或两侧建筑物林立的大道或马路；而在英国则常指通住乡村大住宅、私人大庄园或两旁栽树的道路。
motorway ： 高速公路，新词，特指为车辆快速通行而修的专线，美语为freeway或expressway。
route ： 指从此处通往彼处的路线、路程等。
lane ： 指农村或城镇的小道或小径，也指小巷。
pavement ： 在英国，多指街道两旁的人行道，而美国人常用sidewlk表示人行道。
trail ： 指人或兽在森林、荒野或山中踩出的小径或崎岖小道。

sentence.Network_en: The road to peace will be long and drawn-out.
sentence.Network_cn: 通往和平的道路将很漫长。

sentence.Network_en: The traffic on the approach road slowed to a crawl.

jx.jx_en_mean: set out on a journey or series of journeys
On tour, as a theatrical company.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English rād 'journey on horseback', 'foray'; of Germanic origin; related to the verb ride

entry.def: A road is a long piece of hard ground which is built between two places so that people can drive or ride easily from one place to the other.

example.ex: There was very little traffic on the roads...
We just go straight up the Bristol Road...
example.tran: 我们就沿着布里斯托尔大道直走。

entry.def: The road to a particular result is the means of achieving it or the process of achieving it.

example.ex: We are bound to see some ups and downs along the road to recovery.
example.tran: 在经济复苏的过程中，我们一定会经历一些曲折起伏。

entry.def: If you hit the road, you set out on a journey.

example.ex: I was relieved to get back in the car and hit the road again.
example.tran: 回到车里重新上路后，我松了一口气。

entry.def: If you are on the road, you are going on a long journey or a series of journeys by road.

example.ex: He hoped to get a new truck and go back on the road.
example.tran: 他希望能有一辆新的卡车，重新上路。

entry.def: If you say that someone is on the road to something, you mean that they are likely to achieve it.

example.ex: The government took another step on the road to political reform.
example.tran: 政府在实现政治改革的路上又迈进了一步。

example.ex: ...the stunning fashion pictures which launched unknown teenager Jane March on the road to stardom.
example.tran: 让名不见经传的少女简·马奇走向成名之路的惊艳的时装照片

means.word_mean: 1. an open way (generally public) for travel or transportation
2. a way or means to achieve something;
2. working for a short time in different places;

example.en: Just be glad I'm your road dog.
example.zh: 我是你的至交，你应该高兴才是。

Road and rail links for small towns

Get out of my road, I want to pass.

jushi.english: There have been so many road accidents lately that you must teach the children about road safety.
jushi.chinese: 近来,交通事故不断发生,你们要教给孩子们交通安全常识。

jushi.english: He slipped on the icy road and broke his leg.
jushi.chinese: 他在结冰的路上滑倒而摔断了腿。

jushi.english: I swerved to the side of the road to avoid the other car.
jushi.chinese: 我猛地一下转到路边,以避开另一辆汽车。
